div.div: Chapter . View Visit Information from the Customer or Account Springboard
Chapter . View the Current Average Wait Time

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

div.p: The Visit manager allows users to track, manage, and respond to phone calls, chat sessions, and walk-in or in-person meetings with customers. These interactions are recorded in the system as visits. Users add visit actions to visits to record customers' questions and to perform various actions in the system, as necessary.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

section.p: You can view all visits in the system from the Visit manager.
To view a visit from the Visit manager:

ul.li: Clicking the hyperlinks on the summary panel to view a summary of visits.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

h1.span: View Visit Information from the Customer or Account Springboard

section.p: You can view visits associated with a customer or account from the Customer or Account springboards, respectively.
To view visit information for a customer or account:

li.span: Access the appropriate Customer or Account springboard.
View the Visits tab (under Letters). A list of active and historical visits for the customer is displayed.
Click the hyperlink in the Visit column. The Visit springboard is displayed.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

section.p: You can view a list of all visits that have not yet been completed from the Visit manager.
To view a list of all active visits:

li.span: In the Active Visit Summary panel, click the active visits hyperlink. A window is displayed, listing all active visits.

div.div: Note: You can refresh the statistics in the Active Visit Summary panel by clicking the window name in the sidebar, or by pressing the F5 key on your keyboard.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

section.p: You can view a list of all visits currently in progress from the Visit manager.
To view a list of all visits in progress:

li.span: On the Active Visit Summary panel, click the in progress hyperlink. A window is displayed, listing all visits in progress.

div.div: Note: You can refresh the statistics in the Active Visit Summary panel by clicking the window name in the sidebar, or by pressing the f5 key on your keyboard.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

h1.span: View the Current Average Wait Time

section.p: You can view the average wait time for all visits that are unassigned. This summary includes the amount of time that a visit has been waiting and the amount of time that a visit has been on hold.
If there are no unassigned visits in the system, the current average wait time is zero (0.00).
To view the current average wait time:

li.span: The average wait time is displayed on the Active Visit Summary panel next to the Clock icon

div.div: Note: You can refresh the statistics in the Active Visit Summary panel by clicking the window name in the sidebar, or by pressing the f5 key on your keyboard.

li.span: Click the minutes average wait time hyperlink. A window is displayed, listing all visits currently contributing to the average wait time.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

section.p: Depending on your agency's configuration, visits may be automatically or manually added to the system. If needed, you can manually add a visit from the Visit manager.
To manually add a visit from the Visit manager:

li.span: In the Add Items panel, click the Add Visit hyperlink.
Click the Submit button. The visit is added to the system.
